marklogic.body:
Haven't done much the last couple months due to school but... I think I did pretty well,
single leg push - up, touch toes (alt. legs) - 6,6,6 burpees + bonus push - up + Tuck jump - 12,9,7 sandbag swing - 25,27,26 (I believe I was doing this one wrong, my back was hurting :( side lunge touch down - 24,20,17
...Â definitivelyÂ felt the Burn after the 1st round abs,
oblique planksÂ right side - 27 left side - 24 straight leg - 15
AMAZING! I want more
